title: Where's Cyber Pop Zoe's Rollerblades?
body:
You don't even know how stoked I was to see a champion wearing rollerblades even if it is in a skin. In the splash one of her legs is kicked up and we clearly see wheels/rollerblades on her feet. 

Ideally, I ask you put some rollerblades on those feet of hers or at the very least just put shoes on her in the splash art. It's straight up false advertising at this point and I personally don't want the skin if she doesn't have rollerblades. 

You could even just make it a homeguard movement where she pops on some blades and rolls out of base. 

Tldr; Why does Cyber Pop Zoe clearly have rollerblades in her splash art but not on her model?

replies.body: Hey Placentas, she rollerblades on her homeguard run and has a cool half-pipe recall animation. You'll see it when it's on PBE soon!

Yooooooooooo!!!!

The best! So glad to hear the homeguard animation is her blading!

I'm a rollerblade nerd so this has me so stoked since she's already an awesome champion imo. Keep up the awesome work guys! Sorry I should've waited for more reveal before complaining.
That's so cool! I used to blade when I was younger. It reminds me of things like the movie Hackers and Jet Set Radio. I think she's going to be on pbe in an hour or so!
